name: Fracture: City of Destruction
description:
Welcome to Fracture: City of Destruction.

The city of Fracture is in civil unrest. The corrupted government has deployed its private army, known as The Reapers, into the city to seek out and destroy the group of citizens, known as The Bandits, to eliminate any remaining threats to the tyrannical government.

Fracture is an online multiplayer First Person Shooter offering a fast paced, arcade style shooter experience. The Early Access release includes 3 primary weapons and 2 secondary weapons to choose from. Primary weapons have 8 weapon kits and 4 optics to choose from. Weapon kits and optics change your weapons recoil patterns, accuracy, and many other attributes to customize your weapon for your preferred play style. Primary weapons also have a variety of skins to choose from. Players will also have access to 2 lethal grenades and 2 tactical grenades to assist in accomplishing your objective in the game. The Early Access currently offers Team Deathmatch with one playable map. New maps and game modes will be added in future updates. A Battle Royal mode will be in development in the near future as well.

Check out the Community Hub for more information and updates about the game.
